description: This is an oil fueled lamp.  It does not provide much light, but it lasts a long time.  It is turned on.  Use it to turn it off.

This is a specialized small clay container with a wick, an ancient form of oil lamp.  Unlike newer designs, it isn't windproof, so the flame is likely to be extinguished if exposed to wind; better use it indoors.  It does not provide much light, but lasts a long time.  It is lit, consuming oil and providing light.  Use it to extinguish the flame.
